name: Vegan Shepherds Pie with Chickpeas & Sweet Potato
description: Vegan Shepherds Pie with Chickpeas and Sweet Potato mash. Crusted with breadcrumbs, garlic and herbs. 1 hour Easy Vegetarian Shepherd's Pie. Vegan Nut-free Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free

video.name: Vegan Chickpea Sweet Potato Shepherd's Pie | VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Vegan Chickpea Sweet Potato Shepherd's Pie with Garlic Herb Crumb. 
RECIPE : http://www.veganricha.com/2016/10/vegan-shepherds-pie-chickpeas-sweet-potato.html

Vegan Shepherds Pie with Chickpeas and Sweet Potato mash. Savory Brothy Veggies and Chickpeas, mashed potatoes, Crusted with breadcrumbs, garlic and herbs! Use Lentils to make Lentil shepherds pie. 1 hour Vegetarian Shepherd’s Pie. Vegan Nut-free Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free. Great for Holidays, Thanksgiving or everyday.

*************************************************************
My BOOK Vegan Richa's Everyday Kitchen book SHIPPING NOW: http://amzn.to/2npdqH4

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

recipeIngredient: 1 tsp dried thyme ( or 2 tsp fresh)
1.5 to 2 cups veggies (-carrots, peppers, mushrooms, broccoli, celery, chopped)
black pepper and cayenne to taste (1/4 tsp or more)

itemListElement.text: Add sweet potatoes to a pot of water with salt. Bring to a boil and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender. Drain, mash, season with salt, pepper, olive oil, thyme and set aside. (I used pre-cubed sweet potatoes to save time and to save my thumb).
itemListElement.name: Add sweet potatoes to a pot of water with salt. Bring to a boil and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender. Drain, mash, season with salt, pepper, olive oil, thyme and set aside. (I used pre-cubed sweet potatoes to save time and to save my thumb).

itemListElement.text: Meanwhile, Crush coriander and cumin seeds in a mortar pestle or blender/grinder. Heat oil over medium heat in a saucepan. When hot, add the crushed seeds to the oil. Cook for 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add onion garlic and cook for 4 to 5 minutes. I had a thumb injury, so I chopped up onion and garlic in the food processor and used. I also processed the veggies in the processor, to add at the next step. This made the chopping prep a very quick 2 mins.
itemListElement.name: Meanwhile, Crush coriander and cumin seeds in a mortar pestle or blender/grinder. Heat oil over medium heat in a saucepan. When hot, add the crushed seeds to the oil. Cook for 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add onion garlic and cook for 4 to 5 minutes. I had a thumb injury, so I chopped up onion and garlic in the food processor and used. I also processed the veggies in the processor, to add at the next step. This made the chopping prep a very quick 2 mins.

itemListElement.text: Add veggies, thyme, sage and 1/2 tsp salt and cook for another 3 minutes. Add peas, chickpeas, salt (depends on if the chickpeas were salted), water, black pepper, cayenne, soy sauce, celery seeds, and mix well. Cover and cook for 10 minutes. Uncover, add cornstarch mixed with water and simmer until thickened slightly. 5 to 7 mins. Taste and adjust salt, herbs. Preheat the oven to 425 deg F/ 220ºc
itemListElement.name: Add veggies, thyme, sage and 1/2 tsp salt and cook for another 3 minutes. Add peas, chickpeas, salt (depends on if the chickpeas were salted), water, black pepper, cayenne, soy sauce, celery seeds, and mix well. Cover and cook for 10 minutes. Uncover, add cornstarch mixed with water and simmer until thickened slightly. 5 to 7 mins. Taste and adjust salt, herbs. Preheat the oven to 425 deg F/ 220ºc

itemListElement.text: Distribute the chickpea veggie mixture into ramekins (fill 2/3 of the ramekin) or one large baking dish. Add sweet potato mixture on top.
itemListElement.name: Distribute the chickpea veggie mixture into ramekins (fill 2/3 of the ramekin) or one large baking dish. Add sweet potato mixture on top.

itemListElement.text: Mix breadcrumbs, garlic, olive oil, optional nutritional yeast. rosemary or thyme in a bowl. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet potato mash.
itemListElement.name: Mix breadcrumbs, garlic, olive oil, optional nutritional yeast. rosemary or thyme in a bowl. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet potato mash.

itemListElement.text: Bake at 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 15 to 20 minutes. Broil for a minute to brown if needed. Cool for a few minutes then Serve.
itemListElement.name: Bake at 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 15 to 20 minutes. Broil for a minute to brown if needed. Cool for a few minutes then Serve.

itemListElement.text: The baked pie keeps well refrigerated. The filling will thicken a bit. Reheat and serve.
itemListElement.name: The baked pie keeps well refrigerated. The filling will thicken a bit. Reheat and serve.
